node.html: Guest Editor of Special Issue "Artificial Intelligence for Sustainable Services and Applications". Deadline submission is 30 September 2021. Please consider contributing to our Special Issue and Thank you for your consideration.
Topic Editor of Sustainability, Section "Health and Sustainability"
Review Editor for Section IoT and Sensor Networks
Continuously providing timely high quality reports on submitted manuscripts in MDPI. Officially included in the Reviewer Board Member of Sensors and Algorithms.

Participated at the World Class Scholar Symposium (SCKD) event hosted by The Ministry of Research, Technology, and Higher Education of The Republic of Indonesia in August 2019 to make contributions on accelerating Indonesian national development.

node.html: Peer-reviewing submitted paper in well-known journals such as IEEE Transactions on Industrial Informatics, Sensors, IEEE Access and etc. The verified review list can be seen at Publons
Election Commission Member who helped the PERPIKA organization to establish the election for the president position and the leaders of each regional in 2015.
Lead a computer training for Indonesian migrants workers (BMI) in Korea. Through collaboration between Embassy of Indonesia in Korea and Indonesian Students Association in Korea (PERPIKA).
